metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8077 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in the index_urlfetch function in imap/index.c in CyrusIMAP 2.3.19, 2.4.18, and 2.5.6 allows remote attackers to have unspecifiedimpact via vectors related to urlfetch range checks and the start_octetvariable. NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix forCVE-2015-8076.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8077` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cyrus-admin - 2.5.8-1
cyrus-caldav - 2.5.8-1
cyrus-clients - 2.5.8-1
cyrus-common - 2.5.8-1
cyrus-imapd - 2.5.8-1
cyrus-murder - 2.5.8-1
cyrus-nntpd - 2.5.8-1
cyrus-pop3d - 2.5.8-1
cyrus-replication - 2.5.8-1
libcyrus-imap-perl - 2.5.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cyrus-imapd package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.8-1').
